content: BTW - just to say how much I appreciate the work you guys are doing on clinFHIR - especially wrt usability. I know how frustrating it is when things don't work the way you expect them do - and then there are the bugs! We'll get this app running really smoothly soon, and it's in no small part to the input I get from you 'beta testers'! Thanks!

Is the code available to download? I would like to add DocumentReference to the Patient details screen (maybe on a local branch). Also it would help me see what calls are being made and so would help me build a facade onto some other HAPI based demonstrators (the facade handles the SecurityInterceptor which HAPI instances are running behind)
